mdRecord.dcterms:title: Measuring tape
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mead Johnson & Company [manufacturer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Retractable measure tape. Label Information: Mead's; Servamus Fidem; "We are keeping the faith"; Mead Johnson & Co.; on back: Pablum and Pabena for Superior growth. Belonging to Dr.K.W. Howard.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Tape measures
